website_summaries.verdict: A smaller Pack 'n Play that is designed to go through doorways and packs down smaller than other play yards.
pros: Includes a bassinet for infants that can be easily removed
Narrow enough to roll through a doorway from room to room
Vibrate function to help soothe infants
cons: This is not as large of a play space as other Pack 'n Plays
It is also an odd size for sheets

customer_reviews.title: great for traveling with an infant
customer_reviews.text: this is just what i was looking for. we have a arms reach mini co sleeper that we used as a bassinet in our bedroom until we put our son in his own room in the crib. we need something to take with us when we travel and the arms reach co sleeper doesn't work well for that as it doesnt turn into a pack n play and he will outgrow it soon. my son it almost 12 weeks and hes just about too long for the bassinet and hes almost maxed out the weight limit, but set up as a pack n play it will work fine
customer_reviews.author: David & Emily Lewis

customer_reviews.title: What a great purchase. My little guy will only sleep I ...
customer_reviews.text: What a great purchase. My little guy will only sleep I hid vibrating bassinet and now he sleeps in this. Hallelujah!!! The vibrate feature is excellent and the size is absolutely perfect. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling. Fits in infant carseat inside carseat travel bag, too!
customer_reviews.text: We recently purchased this for a long weekend trip. We removed the vibrating part, infant insert, and the toy bar and placed it in the cover bag inside of our infant carseat in the carseat travel bag (tyke gear 3 way travel protection carseat...also purchased on Amazon) so we didn't have to pay to check the pack n play. It's wider on the bottom than the top part when it's open, which wasn't a problem at all. We didn't use the infant part, but the bottom fit my daughter's Dock-A-Tot perfectly. Set up was a breeze and I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kate M.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this Pack N' Play
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this Pack N' Play! This is my 4th one and it is by far my favorite. It's small and fits in the corner of our bedroom, it's easy to fit all the pieces in the case and I found that the covers to changing table pads work perfectly as a fitted sheet! The vibrating feature helps keep our baby sleeping and even helps with collic. It easily moves room to room as needed. The bassinet insert is the perfect size for my 6 week old. Shipping was fast and the price was great. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but small!
customer_reviews.text: I love the design, but it is actually quite small. My 4 month old didn't fit in the bassinet and now he is 6 months soon and I'm afraid he won't fit in the bottom area soon. Should have just bough a standard sized pack and play. And I don't use the music function at all.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Nice Pack-N-Play that blends nicely with a grown up room!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as napping/play solution for our living room. Love it! The neutral colors suit our living decor well and do not scream "BABY!!!" like many of the bright colored baby items out there, which is so nice. It was fairly simple to put together, and the compact size is perfect, as it does not take up much space like the original sized Pack-N-Plays. I recommend getting a quilted pad to place on bottom since it's not made for sheets, as this will help keep the surface clean.
customer_reviews.author: Smilen Sweetie

customer_reviews.title: Great compact playpen but no sheets.
customer_reviews.text: Small and easy to put together. This would be 4 stars but Graco doesn't make a sheet to fit. I emailed Graco regarding the sheets and they apologized that they don't make one and they gave me at $10 credit for Graco products. That was nice of them but it still doesn't solve my need for a sheet.
customer_reviews.author: jv

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up, super portable. I am really happy I made this purchase. We have used it in hotels, outside, in a 4-person tent (and still had room to sleep 2 adults and another child). The compact size is definitely advantageous. Little ones still have plenty of room. My 13-month-old is very comfortable in this.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Perfecttt!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally write reviews I was kind of skeptical about it at first but I couldn't asked for a better pack and play playard my baby girl loves it and it was to easy to put together... my husband said not to buy it but I told him if it doesn't work we cool just return it now he loves it yayyyy... we love it, every new parents whose not too sure like us should buy it,this item is a must have easy to travel and doesn't take too much space in our living room.....
customer_reviews.author: yves shell anglade

customer_reviews.title: Great bassinet with some minor tweaks required
customer_reviews.text: Nice addition for our bedroom. Instead of buying an expensive bassinet we opted for this product. My only complaint is that I can’t really get a sheet on it easily because of how the mat folds. Also, there is a gap in the middle where the fold is and to fix that I had to cut a piece of cardboard and place under the mat. Been using it since my child was born and she’s 2 months old now.
customer_reviews.author: Coffeeldy

customer_reviews.title: Safe place for time-out
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small time-out pit for my toddler to cool off in safely, and this fits the bill perfectly. He has not yet transformed into a refined gentleman but I'll keep you posted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for smaller living areas
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for smaller living areas. Lightweight and easy to move. Worked well as a bassinet when we first brought baby home and had to sleep in shifts between the living room and bedroom. I could move it easily at 2am when I was still healing from a c-section without an issues.
customer_reviews.author: SSZLC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for traveling and for our camper
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted and needed! Perfect size for traveling and for our camper.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Keatts

customer_reviews.title: Easy and light to travel with
customer_reviews.text: Never needed the baaainet portion as I ordered this for sleeping while camping with family. Easy and light to travel with, generally decent looking, make sure to order the separate sheet as noted in the product questions but know it’s really a thin chunk of fabric one could easily make themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten D.

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This was so inexpensive, we bought it for the daycare to make sure our son had a safe, clean place to rest. We ended up leaving it there when he went to another daycare and she talked about how much she loves it. It is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this pack and play fits through doors, and can easily carried around the house without disassembling it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Davis

customer_reviews.title: Love Graco!
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality of the piece - very solid. Makes traveling with a young child much easier,
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for- I needed a smaller pack n play that was easy to travel with yet functional for my baby to sleep in. I was surprised to see also the bassinet vibrates as well! Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: cindy osborn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small areas
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for small areas! We can easily get it through doorways without having to disassemble it. The quality is nice and very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: SpeakNo666

customer_reviews.title: NICE
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a friend with a newborn. Apparently, the vibrating feature is very calming to her baby.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon regular

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness.
customer_reviews.text: This has to be single handedly the best thing I've purchased in a while. It was so sturdy and durable. My nephew absolutely loves it and so do we.
customer_reviews.author: Latara Moore

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! We disassembled it to take on a trip. It disassembles easily and quickly within 2 minutes. It also reassembles fast! So impressed compared to other “pack and plays.” Definite great purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: We love this pack n play
customer_reviews.text: We love this pack n play. It's high enough that the siblings can see the baby but not pick her up. The small compact size fits everywhere and it's easy to move from room to room since it fits through the door way.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: A must for your baby
customer_reviews.text: Great for travel Small yet spacious Easy to fold down for travel or storage Very comfy for baby to skeep in Just great
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Nook Of Amazing Space
customer_reviews.text: I love this. The first time I set it up, it took a minute for the top portion to snap together. Other than that it’s been working great. It’s compact and small. Only issue is remembering the book part for the pack and play. My child sleeps really well in it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small but served its purpose
customer_reviews.text: This is a lot smaller than regular ones...but that's what we needed!!
customer_reviews.author: Tahnee

customer_reviews.title: It also has wheels that allow you to move it from room to room on hard surfaces easily. We've used it every day for the last ...
customer_reviews.text: This takes up little space and has a very cute, gender-neutral design. It also has wheels that allow you to move it from room to room on hard surfaces easily. We've used it every day for the last several months.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lauer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Light and portable just what we wanted for our grandchildren. We have 3 more on the way!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael W. Dence

customer_reviews.title: This is a great option for small spaces with all the features of ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great option for small spaces with all the features of a full size play yard! It fits nicely in our living room with out taking up too much of our floor space. Because the bottom is wide our baby still has plenty of play space. Very light and easy to move from room to room and is quick and easy to fold up or set up. Great if you need a play yard to take with you!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Quintana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size!
customer_reviews.text: The Nimble Nook is exactly what I was looking for. It's not too big and not too small. Fits very well in our living room and easy to move when needed. Very easy to set up. I couldn't be happier and so glad I decided to go with it after much research for a pack n play.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect PackNPlay!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing negative to say! Love everything about this item. Perfect size, love the design color, and so durable!
customer_reviews.author: Nina Lugo

customer_reviews.title: Its easy to ensemble
customer_reviews.text: Its easy to ensemble, nice and light to take with you places. Small and compact but big enough to hold my 10 mos old.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Attractive Design
customer_reviews.text: Stylish. Looks are important as well as safety and function. This one is great so far. Waiting for the baby to arrive to really put it through it's paces.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Simply love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for me 👌 I add the sheet and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: azucena vital

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase Ever
customer_reviews.text: This Pack & Play fits perfect in my little space. Easy to set up and take down. I liked it so very much I recommended this to my friend when she was looking for a baby shower gift :)
customer_reviews.author: Elise C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a boat or small space!
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a pack and play that could fit on our pontoon boat! This one fits perfectly and has an adorable pattern! The "mat" that lays in the pack and play has a very thick cushion- perfect for my son to relax on. I'm beyond thrilled with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Brightbill

customer_reviews.title: Love this play yard
customer_reviews.text: Love this play yard. I actually use it for nighttime sleeping and my son loved it from day one. The mat is softer than regular type and it is perfect for smaller space...it even fits through our small door ways.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Set up was a little interesting but it's a good size pack b play and doesn't take up a ...
customer_reviews.text: Set up was a little interesting but it's a good size pack b play and doesn't take up a lot of space it's also light weight which makes it good for traveling with. I'll probably hold on to this product for future use also
customer_reviews.author: Quest Pickens

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for my living room so that my grandson can take his naps in.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for travel or household use
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size! Smaller up top, but more spacious at the bottom. A regular size crib sheet will fit. It moves easily around the house with the wheels at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Fits perfect in our small master bedroom and easy to put together and take apart.
customer_reviews.author: NicoleY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: small and sturdy, good for tight places, very neutral. love it!
customer_reviews.author: rebecca merced

customer_reviews.title: Directions were easy to understand
customer_reviews.text: This pack and play is really well made. Directions were easy to understand.
customer_reviews.author: H. G.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it my daughter put it together in under 15minets
customer_reviews.author: VEL

customer_reviews.title: Great size for small places
customer_reviews.text: Great price and perfect if you don't have a lot of room.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Just what we need to stick in our truck when ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what we need to stick in our truck when we are going someplace. Or outside with our toddler the top is a little smaller than I expected but it will work for time being till he can sit up and what not.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa E.

customer_reviews.title: Got this to fit at the foot of the bed ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this to fit at the foot of the bed in our trailer (between the foot of the bed and the wall. The narrorower top fits perfectly. We wouldn't have been able to fit a play pen that wasn't narrow at the top.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis DeBruler

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product and have used it many times already. Highly recommend it to anyone who has a small child.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Martin

customer_reviews.title: Would be more nimble with wheels
customer_reviews.text: Love the size of this play yard, fits perfect in our room. Just wish it had wheels like the bigger ones.
customer_reviews.author: anne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel and limited spaces!
customer_reviews.text: Very compact and portable even thru narrow spaces which is just what we needed! Much easier to set up and take down compared to the previous size.
customer_reviews.author: Nanci St Louis

customer_reviews.title: No Sheets Fit, Disappointed in the quality of Graco products
customer_reviews.text: There are no sheets that fit this model. If GRACO makes a product that isn't standard to all the rest of their pack & plays then they need to make a special sized sheet customers can purchase for it. The pad is not waterproof and therefore is hard to clean when baby makes a mess. It will serve it's purpose I suppose which is to give the baby a place to be in outside besides the pram. I wouldn't recommend it though. I have actually been very disappointed in the quality of Graco products when they are a childrens company.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: The product arrived perfect and looks good!
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived perfect and looks good! But we didn't tested yet.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Mellin

customer_reviews.title: This pack n play is perfect if you're looking for a smaller item
customer_reviews.text: This pack n play is perfect if you're looking for a smaller item. It worked great transitioning our baby boy from a bassinet. He still felt cozy in his new pack n play :)
customer_reviews.author: lydia

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I packed it for us when we went to Hawaii. Loved it!
customer_reviews.author: becky b andong-coffin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my 8 month grandson for sleep overs
customer_reviews.author: Pinkmochi

customer_reviews.title: but good for travel
customer_reviews.text: its a bit small, but good for travel, as a bassinet for early months, or for moving around your house during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Extremely maneuverable. I can carry it everywhere I want to take it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Banks

customer_reviews.title: I did love the pack and play
customer_reviews.text: I did love the pack and play, i give it 4 stars because I thought it was gonna bit a bit bigger, but I think its the perfect size for a baby until the first year, even to travel it appears to be very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: VANESSA GRECO

customer_reviews.title: This pack and play is great if you need to travel (folds up easily
customer_reviews.text: This pack and play is great if you need to travel (folds up easily, its light weight) or move it around the house (without breaking it down). My only complaint is that the bottom mat STAINS extremely easily. Even a little drop of drool leaves a mark and after a week it looked like the pack and play was "dirty". I have tried various methods to clean up the spots, but no luck. Such a bummer because I would totally support a 5 star review if that mat was a different color and material.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. G

customer_reviews.title: It's nice but my baby is almost 6 months now and ...
customer_reviews.text: It's nice but my baby is almost 6 months now and will soon outgrow it. I would not buy again, I would prefer a bigger one.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio

customer_reviews.title: Not safe!
customer_reviews.text: First, I was rather surprised at the size of this playard when it arrived. I thought it was going to be slightly larger than a traditional one because it advertises being larger at the bottom. It was quite small. More for a very young baby than a toddler. And second, within moments of being placed into it, my 16 month old grandson poked a hole through the mesh with his bare finger. Not safe! He could have easily torn a hole big enough to get caught in and injured. This is why I returned it. Does anyone know if there is a recall on this item?
customer_reviews.author: jac

customer_reviews.title: It's small and easy to travel with
customer_reviews.text: I work from home and this is a life saver I wish I would have gotten it in my baby shower I was not able to use the bassinet. It's small and easy to travel with. This is my I need to drop off the baby for a date night playpen travel must have. I recommend it in addition to the regular size because he will outgrow this one faster than the regular size.
customer_reviews.author: Nsamantha305

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its a win win for my grndson. Its not as bulky and heavy as alot of other ones.
customer_reviews.author: loretta

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for taking on vacation or even leaving it up ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for taking on vacation or even leaving it up in the living room. Unfortunately I haven't been able to find sheets for it and because the padding is almost nonexistent my little one doesn't nap/sleep well. That's the only reason this isn't receiving 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Curf441

customer_reviews.title: Soothing does not work in the very bottom for when baby is bigger and can stand.
customer_reviews.text: I love this playard, but c'mon the vibrating soothing machine cannot be move to the very bottom so that it is still working. It only works when it is setup in the bottom for small baby age. Other than that I am still satisfied with my purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves vibration!
customer_reviews.text: My son wouldn't sleep for the 2 months of his life alone unless his bed/bassinet would vibrate!This was a life saver it stays on as long as you want and makes for an awsome travel bed! Or play pen!
customer_reviews.author: LsMoM15

customer_reviews.title: It requires a different mattress for the top
customer_reviews.text: I had to cut a box to place under the mattress part for my son because when folded, he cried with the split under that caused him to tilt and felt very uncomfortable. I should have listened the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Founa

customer_reviews.title: So kinks but still good.
customer_reviews.text: Super simple to set up. Only had a problem with putting the mattress pad in the bassinet mode. Also the wheels aren't smooth to use. But overall, good product
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, fits in smaller spaces
customer_reviews.text: Nice size, fits in smaller spaces. Bassinette portion is a slighty closed off with the design of the padding.Easily portable.
customer_reviews.author: p

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Im short 4'8" and my husband is 6'2" it works wonderfully for both of us!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, everything was in perfect condition. This play pen is small, compact and a perfect transition sleeper for a new baby.
customer_reviews.author: perfect1544

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we ordered. Extremely happy with our purchase. We can't wait to put it to good use!👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Lisa León

customer_reviews.title: LOOOOOOVE <3
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THE SIZE, THE COLOR & HOW FAST THE SHIPPING WAS. ESPECIALLY WHERE I AM LOCATED. IT ONLY TOOK 5 DAYS TO GET HERE. AND IM SO HAPPY AND CANT WAIT TO USE IT FOR MY BABY ON THE WAY. <3 THANKS SO MUCH FOR SHIPPING SO QUICKLY!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for something for my son to sleep ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something for my son to sleep in on our room for the first 6 months until he could share with his sister. While this kinda fit the bill, the bassinet portion is smaller than I was expecting. At 4.5 months he has outgrown it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: If you're buying this for toddler travel save your money. Children over 30in can absolutely climb out.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah G

customer_reviews.title: I love this. The size is perfect for someone who ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this. The size is perfect for someone who lives in a small condo like me. And it is very well design and good quality material too.
customer_reviews.author: Primavera Kitchen | Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Love the small footprint that this takes up and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the small footprint that this takes up and the neutral colors. We actually use it in our master bathroom just to corral our our toddler for a shower and he likes to stand up in it and hold the sides because he can reach both sides at once. Because of this tendency it might not work if you wanted to leave a baby in it for more than a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Kristeenie

customer_reviews.title: Go to Toys R Us you'll get more for cheaper and nice quality. I defiantly return mine if i could
customer_reviews.text: Ugh!! Go to Toys R Us you'll get more for cheaper and nice quality. I defiantly return mine if i could.

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: This is great for travel, fits my 13 month old very well! Highly recommend it.

product_meta.title: Graco Pack 'n Play Playard Nimble Nook | Includes Full-Size Infant Bassinet, Pierce
product_meta.description: Color:PierceRemovable, full-size bassinet provides the perfect spot for baby to catch a nap at home or away. Automatically folding feet and wheels allow for a more compact fold, easy to store and perfect for travel. Durable frame makes this playard ideal for travel. Signature Graco push-button fold makes closing your playard quick and hassle-free.
feature_bullets: Removable, full-size bassinet provides the perfect spot for baby to catch a nap at home or away. Bassinet can be used for babies under 15 pounds and play yard for children under 35 inches who are unable to climb out
Automatically folding feet and wheels allow for a more compact fold, easy to store and perfect for travel
Durable frame makes this playard ideal for travel. Clean with household soap and warm water/drip dry, No bleach
Signature Graco push-button fold makes closing your playard quick and hassle-free
Product Length:38.75 inches. Product Width:27 inches. Product Height:27.125 inches. Folded Depth:10 inches. Folded Height:25 inches. Folded Width:10 inches

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars168 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
